name: Codaxy
description:
We are a highly skilled and experienced Team of 15+ developers, designers and IT/ business specialists who believe that quality software is built with the right approach and the right people.
We use the latest, reliable technologies and proven agile methodologies. Our specialties include Web Programming, C#, JavaScript, Ext JS, and .NET
 
We are especially proud of our main product - CxJS which is a modern UI JavaScript framework designed to build rich internet applications with ease.
CxJS includes form elements, advanced data tables, charts, client-side router and other superbly crafted components used in contemporary JavaScript applications. It is one of the most performant, themeable and developer friendliest JS framework you can find today. 
Highest product quality and customer satisfaction is our ultimate goal. Reach us and find out what exactly we can do to help your business grow.
